meanings.definition: A data format used for providing users with frequently updated content.
meanings.sent1: I checked my newsfeeds to see the latest updates.
meanings.sent2: Her newsfeeds were filled with interesting articles and videos.
meanings.sent3: The newsfeeds on my phone kept me entertained during the long wait.
meanings.sent4: His mind was like a newsfeeds, constantly refreshing with new information.
meanings.sent5: The newsfeeds on the website were like a never-ending stream of news.

meanings.definition: A feature on social media platforms that displays updates from other users or sources.
meanings.sent1: She scrolled through her newsfeeds to catch up on her friends' posts.
meanings.sent2: The newsfeeds on the app showed me what everyone was up to.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally liked a post while scrolling through my newsfeeds.
meanings.sent4: The newsfeeds on social media can sometimes feel overwhelming with information.
meanings.sent5: His newsfeeds were full of funny memes and cute animal videos.

meanings.definition: The content that is delivered through a newsfeed.
meanings.sent1: The newsfeeds on my homepage were filled with breaking news.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy reading the newsfeeds from my favorite websites.
meanings.sent3: The newsfeeds on my phone seemed to know exactly what I wanted to read.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a newsfeeds, constantly updating with new stories.
meanings.sent5: The newsfeeds on the app kept me informed about the latest trends.
